name: Phrack Magazine
description: A magazine written by and for hackers - the best, and by far the longest running hacker zine.

name: bank authorization chip
description: The authorization control an ATM uses to connect to the bank network.  This chip could be used to make a portable cashcard reader.

name: burnt out authorization chip
description: The authorization control an ATM uses to connect to the bank network.  This object has been destroyed by excessive electric current and is now useless.
